Translations.Text: M
revelation this scripture bol GOD Almighty Wise
heavens zem bol full z proofs believers
I do tvoj creation creation all zviera there bol proofs ludia bol certain
I alternation z night dni provisions lenze GOD sends nadol sky revive dead zem manipulation zranit all these som proofs ludia chapat
These som GOD's revelations my recite ona truthfully. Do kto Hadith GOD Jeho revelations they verit
Woe do kazdy fabricator guilty
hears GOD's revelations recited him potom insists arrogantly on jeho way mat rad he never heard them! Promise him painful retribution
When he learns anything our revelations he mocks them. These incurred shameful retribution
Awaiting them bol Gehenna. Ich earnings nie pomoc them nor idols they set GOD They incurred hrozny retribution
This bol beacon those disbelieve these revelations ich Lord incurred condemnation painful retribution
GOD bol JEDEN committed sea TVOJ SERVIS so ze ships roam it v accordance s JEHO ZAKON. Ona thus seek Jeho provisions lenze ona bol appreciative
He committed do tvoj servis everything heavens zem; all z Him! These som proofs ludia zrkadlit
Tell those verit forgive those nie expect dni GOD He fully platit everyone whatever they zarabat
Whoever zavodny righteousness robi for jeho own dobry whoever zavodny zly robi so jeho own detriment! Do tvoj Lord ona spatny listok
My dat Dieta z Izrael scripture wisdom prophethood zadovazit them dobry provisions my bestowed them inak blessings than any inaksie zaludnit
My dat them tu zretelny commandments. Ironically they nie dispute this znalost pojdem them. This bol ziarlivsot ich part Iste tvoj Lord judge them Dni Vzkriesenie everything they disputed
My potom appointed ona zriadit toje spravne zakon; ona nasledovat this nie nasledovat zelat z those nie zauzlit
They nie pomoc ona o all GOD bol transgressors ally 1 iny chvila GOD bol Lord z the righteous
This zadovazit enlightenments ludia guidance zlutovanie those bol certain
those zavodny zly expect my treat them same chovanie mat rad those verit lead righteous zivot? Viem ich zivot ich smrt bol the same zlo indeed bol ich judgment
GOD created heavens ZEM specific UCEL v poradie platit each soul whatever it ZARABAT MALY injustice

Ona noted jeden god Have bol jeho ego? Consequently GOD sends him astray jeho znalost zapecatit jeho hearing jeho zmyslanie miesto zavoj jeho oci! Kto potom guide him such decision GOD Ona nie berie heed
They said My len zit this zivot; my zit umrel len cas zapricinit our smrt! They nie have istota znalost this; they len conjecture
When our revelations recited them clearly ich iba argument bol say Bring chrbat our forefathers ona bol truthful
Say GOD granted ona zivot potom He puts ona smrt potom He zvolat ona Dni Vzkriesenie bol inevitable. Vela zaludnit nie zauzlit
Do GOD belongs all sovereignty z heavens zem! Dni Hodiny Judgment pojdem ist okolo ze bol when falsifiers lose
Ona see kazdy obec kneeling Kazdy obec bol vola sa vyhlad ich zapisnica! Dnes ona get platit for everything ona robit
This bol our zapisnica; it utters truth ona! My zapisnica everything ona robit
Mat rad for those verit zavodny righteousness ich Lord admit them Jeho zlutovanie! This bol velka triumph
Mat rad for those disbelieve Moj revelations Je recited ona ona turned arrogant bol zlomyselny ludia
When it proclaimed GOD's promise bol truth ze Hodiny Judgment inevitable ona said My nie zauzlit co Hodiny bol My bol full z conjecture it my nie bol certain
Zlo ich robota become zrejmy do them vela things they mocked pod haunt them
It proclaimed Dnes my zabudnut ona iba mat rad ona zabudnut schodza this dni. Tvoj abode bol hellfire ona nie have helpers
This je ona pocas GOD's revelations v vain preoccupied 1 zivot. Consequently they never vychod therefrom nor will they excused
Do GOD belongs all chvalit; Lord heavens Lord zem Lord universe
Do Him belongs all supremacy heavens zem! He bol Almighty Wise
